## Introduction

This week will introduce how to simplify complex datasets by reducing the number of variables while preserving important information.

## Learning Objectives

By the end of this week, you will be able to:

1. Understand the principle of dimensionality reduction.
2. Understand the method of principle component analysis.
3. Visualise and describe the results of PCA.
